fields.text: Thank you for calling Carta, the equity management platform trusted by thousands of founders, investors, and employees.
Press '[INDEX]' for Customer Support, including cap table management and equity questions.
Press '[INDEX]' for Cap Table and Ownership Inquiries.
All of our equity specialists are currently assisting other customers. Please hold and we will connect you as soon as possible.
Press '[INDEX]' for Tax Forms and Compliance Support.
You have reached our tax and compliance team. Please hold the line and a specialist will be with you shortly.
Press '[INDEX]' for Sales and New Account Setup.
Press '[INDEX]' for Pricing and Plan Details.
One moment please, connecting you to a sales representative to discuss plan options and pricing.
Press '[INDEX]' for Onboarding and Setup Guidance.
An onboarding specialist will be with you shortly to help set up your Carta account. Thank you for your patience.
